dashboard.enterprisePlanDescription: You're on our highest tier plan with all features unlocked

fieldGenerator.generationError: Failed to generate. Please try again.

vaultEditor.expertModeDescription: Direct JSON editing can break system functionality if not done correctly. Only modify if you understand the vault schema and implications.
vaultEditor.extraFieldsTooltip: These fields were imported but are not defined in the schema
vaultEditor.extraFieldsWarningDescription: These fields are not defined in the schema and will be stored under 'extraFields' in the JSON structure.
vaultEditor.failedToSerialize: Failed to serialize data to JSON

ip.description: IP address of the bridge server
ip.label: IP Address

CLUSTER.description: Configure Ceph distributed storage cluster settings

fsid.description: Unique identifier for the Ceph cluster (UUID format)
fsid.label: Filesystem ID

mgrs.description: List of manager nodes in the cluster
mgrs.label: Manager Nodes

monitors.description: List of monitor nodes in the cluster
monitors.label: Monitor Nodes

osds.description: List of OSD (Object Storage Daemon) nodes
osds.label: OSD Nodes

LOG_FILE.description: Path to the system log file
LOG_FILE.label: Log File Path

PLUGINS.description: Plugin configurations with container images and activation status
PLUGINS.label: Plugins

SSH_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Base64-encoded SSH private key for company operations
SSH_PRIVATE_KEY.label: SSH Private Key

SSH_PUBLIC_KEY.description: SSH public key for company operations
SSH_PUBLIC_KEY.label: SSH Public Key

UNIVERSAL_USER_ID.description: Universal user ID for system operations
UNIVERSAL_USER_ID.label: Universal User ID

UNIVERSAL_USER_NAME.description: Universal user name for system operations
UNIVERSAL_USER_NAME.label: Universal User Name

data_pool.description: Separate pool for storing image data
data_pool.label: Data Pool

features.description: RBD features to enable for the image
features.label: Features

object_size.description: Size of objects within the image
object_size.label: Object Size

stripe_count.description: Number of stripes for the image
stripe_count.label: Stripe Count

stripe_unit.description: Stripe unit size for the image
stripe_unit.label: Stripe Unit

datastore.description: Directory path for storing data. If located on a BTRFS filesystem, it will utilize native features. Otherwise, a BTRFS storage pool file will be created and mounted here to enable snapshots and compression
datastore.label: Datastore Path

MACHINE.description: Machine configuration for SSH access and storage

host_entry.description: SSH known host entry for security verification
host_entry.label: Host Entry

ssh_key_configured.description: Check this if the SSH public key is already installed on the target machine
ssh_key_configured.label: SSH key already configured

ssh_password.description: Temporary password for initial SSH key setup only. Leave empty if SSH key is already configured. This password is used once to copy the public key and should be removed afterwards for security.
ssh_password.label: SSH Password

application.description: Application type for the pool (e.g., rbd, cephfs)
application.label: Application

crush_rule.description: CRUSH rule name for data placement
crush_rule.label: CRUSH Rule

min_size.description: Minimum number of replicas required for I/O
min_size.label: Minimum Size

pg_num.description: Number of placement groups for the pool
pg_num.label: Placement Groups

pgp_num.description: Number of placement groups for placement purposes
pgp_num.label: PGP Number

size.description: Number of replicas for objects in the pool
size.label: Replication Size

credential.description: Repository access password (32 characters, alphanumeric + special chars)
credential.label: Access Password

protected.description: Whether the snapshot is protected from deletion
protected.label: Protected

description.description: Optional description of this storage configuration
description.label: Description

name.description: Unique name for this storage configuration
name.label: Storage Name

noVersioning.description: Disable version control for this storage
noVersioning.label: Disable Versioning

parameters.description: Additional rclone parameters for advanced configuration
parameters.label: Additional Parameters

SSH_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Base64-encoded SSH private key for team operations
SSH_PRIVATE_KEY.label: SSH Private Key

SSH_PUBLIC_KEY.description: SSH public key for team operations
SSH_PUBLIC_KEY.label: SSH Public Key

teamDescription.description: Description of team purpose and responsibilities
teamDescription.label: Team Description

SSH_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Base64-encoded SSH private key for user operations
SSH_PRIVATE_KEY.label: SSH Private Key

SSH_PUBLIC_KEY.description: SSH public key for user operations
SSH_PUBLIC_KEY.label: SSH Public Key
